subtitle: Chicken wings are cheap and, although they do not have much meat on them, they are very tasty.

method.text: Heat the honey in a frying pan over a low heat until it melts. Stir in soy sauce and cook for 1 min. Add garlic and cook for 1 min, until the sauce caramelises.
Add the chicken, coat well with the sauce, and cook for 15 min.
Pour in wine, turn over the chicken, and cook for 15 min.
Serve the chicken sprinkled with chives.

title: Sweet and sour chicken wings
